name: Mediecross
description:
A mini-game created for the AGBIC Contest on TigSource.com

Loosely based on the original arcade game 'Metrocross' by Namco.

3D art        : Francois Gutherz - www.Astrofra.com
Animation     : Ryan Hagen - www.HagenAnimation.com
Engine & code : Emmanuel Julien - www.HARFANG3D.com

Special Thanks to Melly for organizing this contest in the middle of the summer 2010.
Thanks to Derek Yu & others of the TigSource.com community.

Last updated on 2010-08-60. Development is currently paused.
